issue.title: [Rust] Ability to create Arrow native types from Rust primitives/types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4195](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4195). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
it looks like we currently only have the ability to create arrays from various Rust primitives, and not the ability to convert single values into Arrow Native types.

I'd like to motivate for the ability to do the latter, as Arrow downstream users can use this to create literal values **(e,g, Float32Array /**+- Float32Type::from(2.1f32))\*
